revised_title: X-ray Reflexion and Antiphase Nuclei in AuCu<sub>3</sub>
tldr: The authors present a simplified method for calculating the diffraction patterns of crystals with antiphase domains, focusing on the alloy AuCu<sub>3</sub>. They correct previous work by Wilson and extend the model to account for differences in interfacial energy between domains of different types. The study provides insights into the structure and properties of gold-copper alloys.
